actions.open:
set:
  field: current_entity.properties.open
  value: true
display_text:
  text: You open the chest.
actions.close:
set:
  field: current_entity.properties.open
  value: false
display_text:
  text: You close the chest.
actions.gather:
if:
  a: current_entity.properties.open
  op: ==
  b: true
  exec:
    display_text:
      text: CHANGE ME TO PICK UP ITEMS
else:
  display_text:
    text: Open the chest first
actions.deposit:
if:
  a: current_entity.properties.open
  op: ==
  b: true
  exec:
    display_text:
      text: CHANGE ME TO DEPOSIT ITEMS
else:
  display_text:
    text: Open the chest first
